biotools.summary:
sangeranalyseR: a suite of functions for the analysis of Sanger sequence data in R.

This package builds on sangerseqR to allow users to create contigs from collections of Sanger sequencing reads.

bioschemas.name: sangeranalyseR

sangeranalyseR: a suite of functions for the analysis of Sanger sequence data in R.
